title: Ride Range & Fuel Stop Planner
description: Estimate safe ride range and recommended fuel stop intervals.
pageDescription: Plan safer fuel timing for long rides with reserve and real-world efficiency buffers.

sections.title: What It Calculates
content: Safe range after subtracting reserve fuel.
Suggested stop interval below maximum range for margin.
Estimated number of stops for full route distance.

sections.title: Why This Matters
content: Fuel stations may be sparse or closed in remote areas.
Headwinds, elevation, and luggage reduce real efficiency.
Planned stops lower stress and improve ride pacing.

sections.title: Tips
content: Use observed ride economy, not brochure values.
Increase reserve on unfamiliar routes or bad weather days.
Confirm station operating hours before departure.
